mapper.select: SELECT T_SR.USER_ID, T_SR.DATE_TIME ,T_S.SURVEY_TYPE_ID, T_SR.SURVEY_UID FROM MEMBERS as T_M INNER JOIN SURVEYRESULT AS T_SR ON T_M.USER_ID = T_SR.USER_ID INNER JOIN SURVEY AS T_S ON T_SR.SURVEY_UID = T_S.SURVEY_UID GROUP BY T_S.SURVEY_UID, T_SR.DATE_TIME, T_S.SURVEY_TYPE_ID, T_SR.SURVEY_UID ORDER BY T_SR.DATE_TIME DESC;

SELECT T_SQ.SURVEY_QUESTION, T_SO.SURVEY_OPT FROM SURVEYRESULT AS T_SR INNER JOIN SURVEY AS T_S ON T_S.SURVEY_UID = T_SR.SURVEY_UID INNER JOIN SURVEY_QUESTION AS T_SQ ON T_SQ.SURVEY_QUESTION_ID = T_S.SURVEY_QUESTION_ID INNER JOIN SURVEY_OPT AS T_SO ON T_SO.SURVEY_OPT_ID = T_S.SURVEY_OPT_ID GROUP BY T_SQ.SURVEY_QUESTION, T_SO.SURVEY_OPT, T_SR.SURVEY_UID HAVING T_SR.SURVEY_UID = #{SURVEY_UID};

SELECT comm.COMMUNITY_ID, ca.CATEGORY, comm.COMMUNITY_TITLE, comm.COMMUNITY_CONTENT, comm.USER_ID ,comm.COMMUNITY_DATE FROM project_diet.community as comm INNER JOIN category as ca ON comm.CATEGORY_ID = ca.CATEGORY_ID WHERE ca.CATEGORY_ID LIKE 'C%'
AND COMMUNITY_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{words}, '%')
AND USER_ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{words}, '%')
order by COMMUNITY_DATE DESC limit #{pageBegin}, #{pageScale} ;
